bv2:2.1: 2 Sumedhapatthanākathā → sumedhakathā (bj) | paṭhamo dīpaṅkarabuddhavaṃso (s2, s3) | dīpaṅkarabuddhavaṃso (pts1-2)
bv2:43.1: Buddhotivacanaṃ → buddhoti mama (bj, s2, s3, pts1-2, mr)
bv2:50.2: mānusehi ca → mānussakehi ca (bj) | mānusakehi ca (s2, s3, pts1-2, mr)
bv2:69.6: upaṭṭhissatimaṃ → upaṭṭhissati taṃ (bj, pts2) | taṃ upaṭṭhissati (pts1)
bv2:72.4: buddhabījaṃ kira → buddhabījaṅkuro (bj, pts1-2) | buddhavījaṅkuro (s2, s3)
bv2:78.2: Padakkhiṇamakaṃsu → sabbe padakkhiṇamakaṃsu (s2, s3, pts1, mr)
bv2:81.4: abhiññāsu pāramiṅgato → abhiññāpāramiṃ gato (bj) | abhiññāpāramiṅgato (s2, s3)
bv2:181.3: bhavantvantarāyā → bhavatvantarāyo (bj, s2, s3, pts2) | bhavantvantarāyo (pts1)
bv2:190.1: Sumedhapatthanākathā → sumedhakathā (bj, s2, s3, pts2) | sumedhavatthukathā (pts1)
